abilities.name: Cinder Scales
abilities.details: Every time Ignis is hit by an enemy ability, she gains a Cinder Scale (maximum 4 stacks). Each stack grants her increased tenacity.[n]At max stacks, her next basic attack consumes them to deal bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) in an explosion.

abilities.name: Dragon's Breath
abilities.details: Ignis exhales a stream of fire in a cone for a few seconds, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) over time to all enemies hit.[n]If the fire passes through her Infernal Wall, the cone becomes wider, deals more damage, and the duration is extended.[n]In Flame Dragon form, the breath applies a [db]slow[/] to all enemies hit and also reduces their [db]magical resistance[/] each tick of damage, up to a certain limit.

abilities.name: Infernal Wall
abilities.details: Ignis creates a wall of fire that blocks enemy projectiles and deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) to enemies who pass through.[n]In Flame Dragon form, the wall is larger, lasts longer and allies who pass through the wall also gain a [mr]magical shield[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]).

abilities.name: Scorching Charge
abilities.details: Ignis charges forward, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) to all enemies in her path.[n]If Ignis passes through the Infernal Wall, her body ignites, dealing additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) and [db]slowing[/] all enemies hit.[n]In Flame Dragon form, Ignis leaves a trail of fire behind her, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) and [db]slowing[/] all enemies in the trail.

abilities.name: Flame Breaker
abilities.details: Ignis fully embraces her draconic heritage, transforming into a massive Flame Dragon for a duration.[n]In this form, Ignis gains increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and [mr]magical resistance[/].[n]In addition, Ignis's body is engulfed in flame, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [mr]magical resistance[/]) to nearby enemies every second.[n]All of Ignis's abilities are enhanced while in Flame Dragon form.
